p.k: Panda volunteers to be Lucy's partner for a dance contest. But Panda doesn't have the heart to tell Lucy that she's a terrible dancer. / With no place to stay while their cave gets fumigated, the Bears book a night at a hotel for dogs. / After a mishap in the forest, the Bears lose their own home to dangerous animals. / Ice Bear goes on a late-night adventure to rescue his friend, Yana, from some familiar foes.
